reasoning:

My current Three of a Kind is Level 4 (90 chips, 9 mult) and I have 11 plays with it. I have a Venus planet card that can level it up further.

The Jumbo Spectral Pack is tempting but unpredictable, while Hone at $10 is out of reach with my current funds.

With $8 available, applying Venus first makes the most senseâ€”it directly amplifies my primary hand without spending money. That leaves me with options like Business Card ($4) or Standard Pack ($4) to round out my turn, though I could also hold the remaining funds for future rounds.

Since I'm at Ante 6 with increasingly demanding chip requirements, I should prioritize strengthening Three of a Kind through Venus, then move forward to assess what the next blinds will demand.
